attributes.review: Yes some people might be kids but this app is truly bad. It glitches a lot on my phone for no reason. Not only that it took forever to download. Also maybe if Apple took this app down maybe they can fix all of the flaws with that app and there’s a lot of flaws! Please everyone get this app taken down!

attributes.review: This app DOES NOT WORK. It took HOURS to download despite all of the storage on my phone. It was laggy it glitches out and the app it self wasn’t even helpful. They send too many notifications and quite honestly all of the information on this app is so biased. Please do not download this app you’ll instantly regret it.
attributes.title: Terrible do not download

attributes.review: He is the most immature guy I have ever seen. He tells lie after lie, and he wonders why Gen Z doesn’t like him.
